lines.text: The hand that rocks the cradle is the hand that rules the world.
These days a woman can feel incompetent if she doesn't make time for blow jobs and a home-made lasagna.
Marlene was never much of a cook.
Cancel my morning.
But you have a showing! What do I tell them?
You have a Harvard education, make something up!
Marlene, is everything all right?
No! I need a doctor. KNOW of any, Mrs Mott?
Are you a retard?
No
Did you like looking at me?... Did you like looking at me? Don't fuck with me, retard. My version of the story will be... better.
When your husband makes love to you, it's my face he sees!
[Claire Bartel is having an asthma attack]
Something the matter, Claire?
[whispers]
When your husband makes love to you, it's MY face he sees. When your baby's hungry, it's MY breast that feeds him. Look at you! When push comes to shove... you can't even breathe!
I won't let you hurt them!

[to schoolyard bully]
I got a message for you, Roth! LEAVE EMMA ALONE! Look at me - if you don't, I'm gonna rip your fucking head off!
My husband was my only family. He's the only one who really understood me... He took care of me. He was murdered.
Murdered?
They never caught who did it. But I firmly believe, what goes around comes around.
She's Doctor Mott's widow, Michael!
Marlene, I think I'm gonna bum one of these.
[Takes one of her cigarettes]
You are such a bad influence. He only smokes around you now.
Peyton, if something happens to my mommy, would you take care of me?
Of course I would... and your daddy, too! I'd take care of ALL of you!
[on the phone]
Who is this?
Marlene Craven, you want me to spell it?
This is my family.
